bibl.seg: Włodzimierz Godlewski & Adam Łajtar (edd.), Between the Cataracts. Proceedings of the 11th Conference for Nubian Studies, Warsaw University, 27 August - 2 September 2006. Part One. Main Papers = PAM. Supplement Series. 2.1.
